page.title: 05CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: {GHOSTHUNTERS:}3-20 people take part. To choose the{ghost}you stand in a circle & look down, eyes closed. All hold hands. Someone starts by squeez- ing the hand of the person on their right, & so on round the circle. The person who started says Stop; the one whose left hand is squeezed is the ghost, the rest{detectives.}The ghost chases the rest, who{must scream}& if tapped must fall down dead. The ghost must scream so no one knows who he is. The last one tapped starts again. {GRANDMOTHER'S FOOTSTEPS:}You need 4 or more players. One person is{Granny}& the others stand up to 3 metres away. Granny has an{object}beside her. The others{creep}up & try to get it. When she turns round they must stand still. If she sees them move they must start again.The person who gets the object becomes Granny, & the game restarts.
